DOC.brief_summary: A clinical Study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics ( PK/PD ) YH4808 repeat Oral administration Postprandial state healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: YH4808 Postprandial PK/PD Study Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female age 20 55 body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 25 kg/m2 2 . Subject congenital , chronic disease disease symptoms medical examination result 3 . Subject show negative reaction UBT ( Urea Breath Test ) 4 . Subject judge eligible principal investigator subinvestigator accord various reason include abnormal test result ( clinical laboratory test , chest Xray test , 12lead ECG etc ) 4 week first IP adminitration 5 . Medically acceptable contraception ( include individual medically unable become pregnant ) use clinical trial 6 . Volunteers sign write informed consent voluntarily , prior procedure , use form approve local Institutional Review Board detail explanation purpose , content , characteristic drug 1 . Subject hypersensitive component contain YH4808 drug 2 . Subject history presence clinically significant disease liver , kidney , gastrointestinal tract , nervous system , respiratory system , endocrine system , blood tumor , cardiovascular , urinary system , mental disorder 3 . Subject history surgical operation disease related gastrointestinal symtem ( e.g . crohn 's disaese , ulcer etc except appendectomy simple herina ) 4 . Other exclusion apply
